name: Tanvir Tareq
title: Software Engineer
aboutMe:
I am a passionate Software Engineer with over 2.5 years of professional experience in building scalable, high-performance applications.
Currently, I work at Therap Services, LLC, where I have contributed to enhancing core product features by improving billing efficiency, designing custom validation systems, and optimizing workflows that significantly boosted user experience and reduced processing time. I have also worked on migrating the frontend from JSP to React, modernizing the user interface and improving maintainability.
I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Shahjalal University of Science and Technology.
Beyond my professional work, I have a strong background in competitive programming, where I consistently ranked among the top performers across global platforms:
- Candidate Master on Codeforces (Top 0.03% globally)
- 5-star on CodeChef (Top 1% globally)
- High rating of 2283 on LeetCode (Top 0.69% globally)
- Achieved top placements in multiple ICPC and university-level contests
- 4-time Meta HackerCup T-shirt winner (Top 8%, 6%, 4%, and 959th worldwide)
I am also deeply interested in Artificial Intelligence and have explored AI-driven personal projects, including developing a Dots and Boxes game with AI and building an Anki Desktop App add-on using agentic AI to create custom flashcards and add them to decks. For generating these custom flashcards, I utilized the Gemini API.
Driven by curiosity and a commitment to excellence, I strive to bridge the gap between theory and real-world applications, creating solutions that are both efficient and impactful.
